channel.title: Making my NPC walk 317(delta)
channel.description:
I have my zammy wizard at AbsX: 3088 AbsY: 3487 Can someone please help me so he can walk and not just stay still, here is what i have. [code]spawn = 1007 3088 3487 0 0 0 0 0 1[/code]
Can someone give me the code to change that to.

item.title: Making my NPC walk 317(delta)
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“dagger9090, post:1, topic:517743”]I have my zammy wizard at AbsX: 3088 AbsY: 3487
Can someone please help me so he can walk and not just stay still, here is what i have.

Can someone give me the code to change that to.[/quote]
lol I learned this a little while back ago and would like to express my knowledge in this subject matter.

Like #DAn0194 said

that is the right way to do but you need to make sure that where he put the +1 on the xCoord and the +1 on the YCoord that they must be equal…while the only way I could get mine to work.
For example it would look like this

well hope it helps have fun

item.title: Making my NPC walk 317(delta)
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

spawn = NPCID XCOORD YCOORD H XCOORD+1 YCOORD+1 XCOORD-1 YCOORD-1 walktype

Okay

so NPCID = the npc that you want to be spawned.
the XCOORD = where you want the x coordinate of the NPC to be.
the YCOORD = where you want the y coordinate of the NPC to be.
H = heightLevel.
XCOORD+1 = just the x coordinate of the NPC +1 so e.x. if the x coordinate was 3020 it will be 3021
YCOORD+1 = just the y coordinate of the NPC +1 so e.x. if the y coordinate was 3020 it will be 3021
XCOORD-1 = just the x coordinate of the NPC -1 so e.x. if the x coordinate was 3020 it will be 3019
YCOORD-1 = just the y coordinate of the NPC -1 so e.x. if the y coordinate was 3020 it will be 3019
walkType = just keep this at 1.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
